RelatedSentence: The Bellingham Herald reported that a panel representing Burlington Northern Santa Fe , the Association of Washington Cities and the state Ecology Department will discuss oil and coal train hazards and traffic disruptions .

The Bellingham Herald reported that a panel representing Burlington Northern Santa Fe , the Association of Washington Cities and the state Ecology Department will discuss oil and coal train hazards and traffic disruptions .

The Bellingham Herald reported that a panel representing Burlington Northern Santa Fe , the Association of Washington Cities and the state Ecology Department will discuss oil and coal train hazards and traffic disruptions .
The public will have a half - hour to comment at the meeting , which is being held from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. at the City Hall in Bellingham .
